suncertify.application
Class ApplicationProperties

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
          java.util.Properties
              suncertify.application.ApplicationProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
public final class ApplicationProperties
extends java.util.Properties

Properties of the application, i.e. those used by client or server components.

Provides support to load and save the properties in a special properties file. Provides named access methods to the properties.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

ApplicationProperties

public ApplicationProperties()
Method Detail

load

public void load()
          throws java.io.IOException
Tries to load the properties from the properties file, if it exists. The file is searched in the current working directory.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - indicates an error during file handling.

save

public void save()
          throws java.io.IOException
Saves the properties to the properties file.

If the file does not exist, it is created in the working directory.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - indicates an error during file handling.
